author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 44,149 students from 463 schools in Madurai district will take SSLC examinations which start on Tuesday.

According to officials from School Education department, girls and boys are almost equal in numbers in the district. However, in Usilampatti educational district, 53 per cent of the 9,292 students are boys while in Madurai educational district, around 52 per cent of the 20,475 students are girls.

The students will write the examination in 124 centres in the district, of which 56 are in Madurai Educational district, 40 in Melur educational district and 28 in Usilampatti educational district. There are also six private centres in the district.
title: 44,149 students to take SSLC exams
